tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (XSS) due to improper sanitization of user-controlled input in the OAuth callback handler. The vulnerability occurs when the application constructs a redirect URL by directly embedding unescaped query parameters into JavaScript and HTML content. An attacker can exploit this by crafting a malicious URL with harmful JavaScript in the query parameters, which executes in the victim's browser when they complete the OAuth flow, potentially leading to session hijacking or unauthorized actions.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `github.com/qor5/x/v3` library to the patch version.
